questions.question: Set in a samurai country closed off from the world, this arc features a rebellion against a Shogun and an Emperor of the Sea. What is...?
Set on a cloud island, this arc features a battle against a powerful Warlord of the Sea known for his fiery fists. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
